company.name: ALLPro NYC LLC DBA Allpro Consulting

description:
Join our dynamic team as a Logistics Coordinator I, where you’ll be the driving force behind the seamless transportation and delivery of goods from start to finish. Collaborate with internal teams, external vendors, and clients to ensure top-notch logistics operations. If you have a knack for organization, an eye for detail, and thrive in a fast-paced environment, we want to hear from you!

Pay Rate & Contract Details

  • Pay Rate: USD $25.00 - $30.00 per hour
  • Contract Length: 6 months

Roles & Responsibilities

  • Coordinate goods movement: schedule transportation, track shipments, and ensure timely delivery
  • Use ERP systems (SAP preferred) for record-keeping and purchase order tracking
  • Update purchase orders and maintain shipment records, ensuring compliance
  • Communicate with carriers, suppliers, and customers to manage pickups, deliveries, and resolve issues
  • Monitor inventory, work with procurement and warehouse teams to optimize stock and minimize shortages
  • Ensure compliance with logistics regulations and company policies
  • Utilize logistics software to track shipments, generate reports, and analyze performance
  • Identify process improvements and cost-saving opportunities
  • Maintain accurate records of shipments, invoices, and documentation
  • Provide excellent customer service by handling inquiries and resolving issues

Minimum Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in logistics, supply chain management, or a related field
  • 2+ years of logistics coordination experience, preferably in a similar industry
  • Proficiency in ERP systems, especially SAP
  • Experience with state-line shipments and large box stores
  • Strong understanding of transportation regulations and logistics processes
  • Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written
  • Proficiency in logistics software and Microsoft Office Suite
  • Ability to manage multiple projects and prioritize tasks effectively
  • Detail-oriented with strong problem-solving skills
  • Commitment to customer satisfaction and continuous improvement

Ready to Make an Impact? Send your resume to consulting@allprony.com and let’s get started!

Hashtags: #LogisticsCoordinator #SupplyChainManagement #ERPSystems #SAP #TransportationManagement #InventoryManagement #CustomerService #LogisticsSoftware #ProcessImprovement #RegulatoryCompliance
